_header: Soon so he haveth coperoun and the hood
Note:
Cf. these verses, in Latin, said by a devil rewarded for serving a miller: Wright (1842)
XWright, Thomas. A selection of Latin stories.
Percy Society 8. London: Richard, 1842, 107.
Subjects: religious, backsliding by; sermons, verse in; devil; translations
_description: On growing slack after entering a religious order — one couplet

CamGon408.Transcription:
Son so he hauet coperun and te hodne wil he nomore don non
                    god
